Desc.eng: I feel an eerie presence around this painting. Like someone is staring at me.
Why don't you just find a new host?
My imprisonment is final. Ask your vassal to acquire a Soul Sceptre, then use it to lure souls out of the Spirit Dome. Harvest plenty, so their trapped essence can replenish this Shelter.
Have you heard him, my dearest vassal?
Your story is too intriguing to pass. I will help.
The whole tale sounds dubious, we should leave.
He called me Lady Wraith! Finally I've my own nickname!
Not even a speck of dirt on the frame, yet the palace was destroyed centuries ago.
Well, you are staring at an Atlantean Soul Shelter which is nearly indestructible.
I beg your forgiveness Lady Wraith. Is that crude flesh vessel is your servant?
This "crude flesh vessel" will blast you into pieces if you don't introduce yourself!
Before I placed my soul in the Shelter, I was the Court Mage of the 47th Atlantean Emperor. It was the only way to survive the cataclysm.
So this place is indeed the fabled Atlantis. Anything else I should know?
My Shelter must be recharged, so I can survive a few more centuries.
